SARS-CoV-2 variants

Open-source tracking for emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants that pose a risk based on COVID-19 vaccine genetics.

Variants-of-concern

SARS-CoV-2 Variant Classifications and Definitions were derived from www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/variants/

This dataset includes:

  • Variants of Interest (VOI)
  • Variants of Concern (VOC)
  • Variants of High Consequence (VOHC)

The reformatted tables are presented in files:

variants_of_concern.xlsx variants_of_concern.csv

There are currently no VOHC. VOC (but not VOI) were presented in the final visualisation.

SARS-CoV-2-VOC.github.io is maintained by DylanLawless
